name: cnnm

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4ri(cfv(cnm, c0), cabs, cfv(cnm, ccnfld), cfv(cnm, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cnm, c0), cabs)
-| wceq(cfv(cnm, ccnfld), cfv(cnm, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld)))
-| wceq(cabs, cfv(cnm, ccnfld))
-| wceq(cfv(cnm, c0), cfv(cnm, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (norm ` c0)= abs
⊣ (norm ` CCfld)=(norm `(ringLMod ` CCfld))
⊣ abs =(norm ` CCfld)
⊣ (norm ` c0)=(norm `(ringLMod ` CCfld))

comment: The norm of the normed subcomplex vector space of complex numbers is the absolute value. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 9-Oct-2021.)
